description: You can create DTM files in Dolphin by selecting Emulation â†’ Start Recording . The DTM file is created to store data such as the game ID, recording start time, controller input data, and other in-game settings.
You can use the Dolphin emulator to view the DTM file. You can also use DTM Editor (only for GameCube controller data) to edit the buttons, triggers, D-Pad , and stick positions for each frame.
